name: tst
description: A lightweight all-powerful TypeScript test library.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && babel src --out-dir build --copy-files --extensions ".ts"
scripts.watch: watchexec --exts ts --only-emit-events --emit-events-to=json-stdio | while read line; do echo received: $line; echo "Skipped $(timeout 1 cat | wc -l) further events"; npm run bundle; done
scripts.watch-test: bash -c 'watchexec --exts ts --only-emit-events --emit-events-to=json-stdio | while read line; do echo received: $line; echo "Skipped $(timeout 1 cat | wc -l) further events"; npm run build && npm run test "$@"; done' _
scripts.watch-start: watchexec -w src -e ts,json,js -r --stop-signal=INT -- npm run self-test
